results.title: Viola Davis and Company on ‘Ma Rainey’ and Chadwick Boseman’s Last Bow
results.abstract: Members of the creative team discuss what it took to adapt the August Wilson play for Netflix and trying not to be “outdone” by the late actor.

results.title: Tom Cruise Erupts at ‘Mission: Impossible’ Crew Over Covid-19 Breach
results.abstract: On a film set in Britain, the actor tore into the crew with an expletive-laden rant. Production of the blockbuster film had previously been delayed by the pandemic.

results.title: Emerald Fennell’s Dark, Jaded, Funny, Furious Fables of Female Revenge
results.abstract: A brilliant young showrunner from “Killing Eve” unveils her first film, “Promising Young Woman,” bringing macabre feminist wit to experiences that no one wants to talk about.

She went from bubbly sex symbol in the “Carry On” films to working-class hero on “EastEnders.” Her private life was often as troubled as her “EastEnders” character’s.

results.title: Better Than Besties: Why Gay Holiday Films Matter
